arm_group.description: patients who underwent coronary artery bypass surgery between 2010 and 2012 in Samsung Medical Center

brief_summary.textblock:
Acute kidney injury after cardiac surgery is a major complication after cardiac surgery and
      has been reported to be associated with adverse outcome. There have been many studies
      reporting risk factor of acute kidney injury after cardiac surgery, but the influence of
      perioperative variables related to anesthesia and perioperative medication has not been
      evaluated fully. The investigators attempt to evaluate the influence of preoperative
      medication, preoperative albumin level, uric acid concentration, anesthesia technique, use
      of hydroxy ethyl starch, blood glucose level, intraoperative medication, and hemodynamic
      variables during surgery on the incidence of acute kidney injury after coronary artery
      bypass graft.

clinical_study.brief_title: Predicting Acute Kidney Injury After Coronary Artery Bypass Graft

detailed_description.textblock:
Acute kidney injury after cardiac surgery is a major complication after cardiac surgery and
      has been reported to be associated with adverse outcome. There have been many studies
      reporting risk factor of acute kidney injury after cardiac surgery, but the influence of
      perioperative variables related to anesthesia and perioperative medication has not been
      evaluated fully. The investigators attempt to evaluate the influence of preoperative
      medication, preoperative albumin level, uric acid concentration, anesthesia technique, use
      of hydroxy ethyl starch, blood glucose level, intraoperative medication, and hemodynamic
      variables during surgery on the incidence of acute kidney injury after coronary artery
      bypass graft.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  patients who underwent coronary artery bypass surgery during between 2010 and 2012 in
             Samsung Medical Center

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  lack of postoperative creatinine or urine output data

          -  patients who expired within 24hours after surgery

study_pop.textblock:
patients who underwent coronary artery bypass surgery during between 2010 and 2012 in
        Samsung Medical Center

clinical_study.official_title: Predicting Acute Kidney Injury After Coronary Artery Bypass Graft : a Simplified Clinical Risk Scoring Model

primary_outcome.description: Acute kidney injury diagnosis defined by RIFLE criteria (for Risk, Injury, Failure, Loss, End-stage kidney disease) during seven days after surgery
primary_outcome.measure: Acute kidney injury diagnosis defined by RIFLE criteria

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Acute kidney injury as defined by AKIN (acute kidney injury network) criteria
secondary_outcome.measure: Acute kidney injury as defined by AKIN (acute kidney injury network) criteria

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Retrospective
